events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
System has categorized this case under Refund based on keywords found in the customer's initial message.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear you want a refund, let me assist you with that right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you are requesting a refund to proceed with your case?
My order number is 123456789. The product is different from what was described on the website and I’m not satisfied with it.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a full refund once you return the item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate your quick help and will send the package back as soon as I get the label.
We have received your returned item and processed the refund. The amount should appear on your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and are satisfied with how we handled your request.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing your case now, but feel free to reach out any time if you need further assistance.
